intro: This Algorithm Theoretical Basis Document (ATBD) provides a comprehensive description of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's (CLMS) CLCplus Backbone 2023 product. As the first component of the CLCplus Product Suite, the Backbone represents a significant advancement in European land cover and land use monitoring, building upon the legacy of the CORINE Land Cover (CLC) initiative. This document details the product's characteristics, including its 10-meter resolution, 11 land cover classes derived from Sentinel-2 imagery, and the methodologies and workflows used in its production, along with the auxiliary quality layers.
